body.name: Burt’s Bees Foaming Face Wash, BHA Breakout Defense Cleanser for All Skin Types, Washes Away Impurities & Excess Facial Oil, With a Prebiotic, 8 Oz.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 20 hrs 14 mins
features: FOAMING WASH: An 8 fl oz Burts Bees Clear and Balanced Breakout Defense Face Wash provides daily support to address breakout triggers, such as excess oil, clogged pores and skin microbiome imbalances

SKIN-FRIENDLY: Formulated with exfoliating BHA and Inulin, a skin-friendly prebiotic, that is known to support a balanced microbiome, this face and body wash is the must-have to prevent acne breakouts

SKIN EXFOLIATOR FOR CLOGGED PORES: The Willow Bark Extract in the formula also contains natural Beta Hydroxy Acids, which work as gentle skin exfoliators to help unclog pores which helps prevents acne

CLEAN INGREDIENTS: Burt’s Bees Clear and Balanced Breakout Defense Foaming Wash is 98.6% natural in origin and also without parabens, phthalates, petrolatum and SLS for a worry-free skin care solution

NO.1 RECOMMENDED BRAND: From the number one dermatologist-recommended natural skincare brand (1), Burt’s Bees uses landfill-free operations, is Leaping Bunny certified and also CarbonNeutral certified
body.description: Burts Bees Clear and Balanced Breakout Defense Foaming Wash provides daily support to address breakout triggers, including excess oil, clogged pores and imbalances in the skins microbiome. Formulated with exfoliating BHA and Inulin, a skin-friendly prebiotic, that is known to support a balanced microbiome, this face wash is a must-have for preventing breakouts. Additionally, the Willow Bark Extract in the formula also contains natural Beta Hydroxy Acids, which work as a gentle skin exfoliator to help unclog pores. Use it as part of your skin care regimen for naturally beautiful, healthy skin. Burts Bees Foam Wash is 98.6% natural in origin and lovingly formulated without parabens, phthalates, petrolatum or SLS, so you can feel comfortable knowing your favorite skin care brand is clean and safe. From the number one dermatologist-recommended natural skincare brand (1), Burts Bees has landfill-free operations, is Leaping Bunny certified and CarbonNeutral certified. Burts Bees uses ingredients from nature to nourish and revitalize your skin, making products that have become a staple of your household. Based on a September 2021 NielsenIQ national survey of U.S. Dermatologists.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #25,361 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #401 in Facial Cleansing Washes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very gentle on skin
reviews.reviewText: This face was was so affordable I normally use a face wash that isn't very frugal friendly and is more expensive. I was weary about ordering this face wash because of how cheap it is. But I tried this one out and it is so gentle on my skin. The smell of it was a little strong but it has kept my skin clear and does the job of cleaning it I also would make sure to put on a moisture after you use the face wash because it can leave you face a little dry. Other than that I would definitely recommend this one if you are trying to save some money in skin care!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Burt's Bees has always made great products and this is one of them. After using this my face feels so clean and fresh. I have really sensitive skin so finding products that work and don't irritate my skin can be difficult but this product works great and my skin appreciates it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great but doesn't smell great
reviews.reviewText: First of all, this cleanser works amazing at getting off all of my makeup, including waterproof mascara, and making my face feel nice and clean.Second, It does have alcohol in it so it does dry out your skin, but a moisturizer will help combat that. It will also really hurt if you have a cut or get it in your eyes (obviously).Third, I honestly hate the smell, but it works better than most cleansers I've tried so in my opinion it's worth it. Maybe if you already know you like the smell of the willow bark extract you'll love it, but never having smelled it before I can say now that I do not. It's very similar to tea tree oil so it's extremely strong and even hurts my nose to inhale before rinsing it off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love Burts Bees but unfortunately broke out from this
reviews.reviewText: I have loved Burts for decades, but sadly there are additives that make my skin break out from this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic, best I've used hands down.
reviews.reviewText: This face wash not only smells great, but it actually leaves your skin feeling clean but also hydrated at the same time. I have very sensitive skin and using a lot of different types of chemicals on my face in particular cause me to break out in hives. This stuff works wonders if you have sensitive skin- no horrible reactions because of the natural ingredients used. 100% would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Teens love it...
reviews.reviewText: My teens love this face cleanser. They have sensitive skin & 2 have oily skin. This cleanser works well for all of them & their different skin types.I WOULD purchase it again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this product, but I received what’s pictured in the item listing as the “old” version, just a 5-oz bottle. The “new” version is 8 oz. This feels like a bait & switch and I feel ripped off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes skin soft
reviews.reviewText: I had broke out due to monthly cycle and this cleared it right on up. It also makes my face very soft. This smells good and is effective. Would recommend!
